original_title: A Moving Target is Harder to Kill
overview: The Shinoda family is a multi-generational, multi-racial household living comfortably on O'ahu. Despite marriage tensions, Mom and Dad decide to take their young son Ikaika on a road-trip around the island - laying out his culture to him. We ride with their route, enjoy their music, soak in Hawaii's rhythms and colors. As they do this, the Shinodas repeatedly miss that they are headed towards serious trouble.
tagline: Take the day.... take the trip
title: A Moving Target is Harder to Kill
